PARAMETER.NAME: corpusSize
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Number of articles

PARAMETER.NAME: docCountStartOffset
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Document titles will start from this offset

PARAMETER.NAME: lang
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Corpus for language (en/de/nl)

PARAMETER.NAME: firstSentenceOnly
PARAMETER.COMMENT: false if all paragraph should be returned

PARAMETER.NAME: firmArticleTitle
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Instead of random article, the set URL will be retrieved.

PARAMETER.NAME: assignDBpediaTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Will create DBpedia url type annnotations on document.

PARAMETER.NAME: saveInTriplets
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Will resolve hypernym to dbpedia url and save result in triplets.

PARAMETER.NAME: specialWikiAPIURL_EN
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URI to special API

PARAMETER.NAME: specialWikiAPIURL_DE
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URI to special API

PARAMETER.NAME: specialWikiAPIURL_NL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URI to special API

PARAMETER.NAME: wikiAPIBase_NL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URI to special API

PARAMETER.NAME: wikiAPIBase_DE
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URI to special API

PARAMETER.NAME: wikiAPIBase_EN
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URI to special API

PARAMETER.NAME: JAPEPATH_EN
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Path to JAPE grammar for Hearst Patterns

PARAMETER.NAME: JAPEPATH_DE
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Path to JAPE grammar for Hearst Patterns

PARAMETER.NAME: JAPEPATH_NL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Path to JAPE grammar for Hearst Patterns

PARAMETER.NAME: taggerBinary_DE
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URI to special API

PARAMETER.NAME: taggerBinary_NL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URI to special API

PARAMETER.NAME: pathToArticleNames
PARAMETER.COMMENT: read article titles from this file, one title per line

PARAMETER.NAME: startPosInArticleNameList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: start from this line number, min value 1 (0 line contains heading), inclusive

PARAMETER.NAME: endPosInArticleNameList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: end at this line number, min value 1, inclusive

PARAMETER.NAME: hypernymLoggingPath
PARAMETER.COMMENT: output format according to parram
